
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52353658">
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="5"><font color="#24292f">在数字化与智能化迅猛发展的今天，</font><font color="#ff0000">AI技术正在深刻改变艺术创作与文创产品的开发模式。</font></font></font><br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="5"><font color="#24292f">本课程将结合最新的AI工具与艺术文创理念，帮助学员在这一新兴领域实现商业落地。</font></font></font><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_vJWq6" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/803fe0d5-1630-47d5-8d21-41b3cb31dbd1_8ad6488dbfceb.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/803fe0d5-1630-47d5-8d21-41b3cb31dbd1_8ad6488dbfceb.jpg"><br>
<br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_qD2BB" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/1d62f52d-f8f8-4d03-9028-21da59358961_a1ba485ace6de.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/1d62f52d-f8f8-4d03-9028-21da59358961_a1ba485ace6de.png"><br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">---课程模块---</font></font></font><br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="5"><font color="#ff0000"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">AI驱动的正式课程</font></font></font><br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="4">课程内容：深入探讨艺术文创的基本概念与市场趋势，结合AI技术分析消费者需求，助力产品设计与市场定位。</font></font><br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="4">目标：掌握AI在艺术文创中的应用，提升策划与执行的创新能力。</font></font><br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="4"><br>
</font></font><br>
<img id="aimg_EQL5z" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/05ade9ad-7a59-40a8-bc17-a7d5e6540c99_012f8a2a8c2a1.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/05ade9ad-7a59-40a8-bc17-a7d5e6540c99_012f8a2a8c2a1.png"><font face="微软雅黑"><font size="4"><br>
</font></font><br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="4"><br>
</font></font><br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">AI绘画：创意的无限可能</font></font></font><br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="4">课程内容：探索AI绘画工具，学习如何利用AI生成独特的艺术作品。包含创意发想、作品生成与编辑技巧。</font></font><br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="4">目标：激发创作灵感，提升作品的个性化与市场竞争力。</font></font><br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="4"><br>
</font></font><br>
<img id="aimg_nvRR0" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/82f139cf-2bf3-4a43-8141-d4b18af0e893_e0f65d7de9feb.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/82f139cf-2bf3-4a43-8141-d4b18af0e893_e0f65d7de9feb.png"><font face="微软雅黑"><font size="4"><br>
</font></font><br>
<br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">PS必刷：AI与传统设计的结合</font></font></font><br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="4">课程内容：学习Photoshop的必备技巧，结合AI技术进行图像处理与设计，提升作品质量与效率。</font></font><br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="4">目标：掌握图像处理技能，创造出更具视觉冲击力的设计作品。</font></font><br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="4"><br>
</font></font><br>
<img id="aimg_VJ7m6" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/8b68bed2-8b55-49e6-b00f-64a42518fe88_f607e2ee18f85.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/8b68bed2-8b55-49e6-b00f-64a42518fe88_f607e2ee18f85.png"><br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="4"><br>
</font></font><br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">PS基础课程：从零到一的转变</font></font></font><br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="4">课程内容：系统学习Photoshop基础操作与功能，结合AI工具进行简单图像编辑，适合初学者。</font></font><br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="4">目标：为学员打下坚实的图像处理基础，开启艺术创作的新篇章。</font></font><br>
<font face="微软雅黑"><font size="4"><br>
</font></font><br>
<img id="aimg_UoOha" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/7c27b005-66a2-4d5a-a67b-8b18bd240219_37d8dffb96ef7.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/7c27b005-66a2-4d5a-a67b-8b18bd240219_37d8dffb96ef7.png"><br>
